title: Document::location does not contain fragment identifier
description:
Hi,

It is important for me to get the fragment id of a page from jsoup Documents.
Is it possible to get the URL intact as passed to the Jsoup::connect method?

The original URL that I pass to Jsoup::connect method has a fragment identifier at its end.
But Document::location or Document::baseUri do not contain the id.

For example, https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/annotation#annotation-1.4.0-alpha01
becomes https://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/annotation.
